head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REGAN, RICHARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REGAN, RICHARD J.

block.p: REGAN-Richard J. On July 1, 2000. Retired doorman at The University Club and Local 18A. Beloved brother of Helen Issler and Elizabeth O'Connor; adored uncle of Elizabeth McGuire, Patricia Sacco, Dolores Seward and Charles Issler. Visitation Monday 7-9 PM; Tuesday 2-4 and 7-9 PM at John Krtil Funeral Home; Yorkville Funeral Service Inc., 1297 1st Ave., New York City. Mass of Christian Burial Wednesday, 10 AM, St. Jean The Baptiste Church. Interment Calvary Cemetery.
